entry.title: November 2021 LTS backport release
entry.content:
We did it again! A bunch of new backport releases for our Starburst Enterprise LTS users are available.

Following are the new available versions linking to the relevant release notes entries:

  • 350-e.17
  • 356-e.10
  • 360-e.7
  • 360-e.4

Of course the related Helm charts and other resources are all available as part of the update.

And if you are still running 345-e, it is time to upgrade. We no longer backport to it as it reached its end of life date.
entry.summary: We did it again! A bunch of new backport releases for our Starburst Enterprise LTS users are available.
